
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is a Date object.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is a Date object.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( new Date() )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( '2017-01-01' )
    false

    See Also
    --------
